sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: ProFTPD (Pro FTP daemon) is a highly feature rich FTP server, exposing large amount of configuration options to the user.

sections.title: Configuration
sections.content: The configuration file is available at /etc/proftpd.conf. The project's website has an extensive documentation.

sections.title: Anonymous access
sections.content: To head off a common problem, for anonymous access to work with /bin/false as the shell for the ftp user (the default configuration), you must add the line RequireValidShell off to /etc/proftpd.conf. Otherwise anonymous logins will receive a 530 error.
